# LabelStyleConfiguration.Icon

**Structure**

A type-erased icon view of a label.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Icon
```

## Setting the icon

- **icon**: A symbolic representation of the labeled item.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- View
